tests.title: should have CSP meta tag configured
tests.fullTitle: Security Headers Content Security Policy (CSP) should have CSP meta tag configured
tests.code:
cy.get(_support_constants__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.SECURITY_HEADER_SELECTORS.CSP)
    .should("exist")
    .and("have.attr", "content")
    .and("not.be.empty");
